scripts.composer-root: d=.; i=0; while [ $i -lt 10 ]; do if [ -f "$d/composer.json" ] && cat "$d/composer.json" | grep -q '"type"' && cat "$d/composer.json" | grep -q '"project"'; then readlink -f "$d"; break; fi; d="../$d"; i=$((i+1)); done
scripts.install-dev-deps: PACKAGES=$(cat composer.json | jq -r '.["require-dev"] // {} | to_entries[] | "\(.key):\(.value)"' | tr '\n' ' ') && composer --working-dir=$(composer run composer-root) require ${PACKAGES} --dev
scripts.phpcs: mkdir -p test-results && composer --working-dir=$(composer run composer-root) exec phpcs -- --standard=$(pwd)/phpcs.xml --report-width=auto --colors -s --report-junit=$(pwd)/test-results/phpcs.xml --report-full --report-summary $(pwd)
scripts.phpstan: mkdir -p test-results && composer --working-dir=$(composer run composer-root) exec phpstan -- --configuration=$(pwd)/phpstan.neon --error-format=junit analyze $(pwd) > test-results/phpstan.xml || true && composer --working-dir=$(composer run composer-root) exec phpstan -- --configuration=$(pwd)/phpstan.neon analyze $(pwd)
